import React, { Fragment, useEffect, useState } from 'react' import {productDetails} from '../Store/Actions/ProductsActions' import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import Loader from './Loader' import {addTocart} from '../Store/Actions/cartActions' {/*
- +
*/} const ProductDetails =(props)=>{ const dispatch = useDispatch() const product = useSelector(state => state.det.product) const user = useSelector(state => state.auth.user) const loading = useSelector(state => state.det.loading) const err = useSelector(state => state.det.er) const {id} = useParams() const [quantity,setQuantity] = useState(1) const [text,setText] = useState('') useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(productDetails(id)) },[id]) const changeQuantity = (id)=>{ console.log(id) } const cartAdd = (data)=>{ dispatch(addTocart(data)) } const Submit = ()=>{ console.log(text) } return( {loading ? : err ? err.message : (

Product Details

i.url)} alt="sdf" height="500" width="500"/>

{product.name}

Product # {product.id}

({product.numOfReviews} Reviews)

R {product.price}

{product.stock === 0 ? ():( )}

Status: In Stock

Description:

{product.description}

Sold by: Amazon

{user && user.user ? ( ) : }
Submit Review
)} ) } export default ProductDetails
